Name: AERIS Weather
ID: n002_controller
  ***Properties***
    NodeServer Online [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]
    Temperature [id=CLITEMP]
      Range -50 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Humidity [id=CLIHUM]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit Relative Humidity [uom id=22]
    Dew Point [id=DEWPT]
      Range -50 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Pressure [id=BARPRES]
    Wind Direction [id=WINDDIR]
      Range 0 to 360 Unit Wind Direction Degrees [uom id=76]
        No Wind [0]
        East [90]
        South [180]
        West [270]
        North [360]
    Wind Speed [id=SPEED]
      Range 0 to 500 Unit km/h [uom id=32]
      Range 0 to 500 Unit mph [uom id=48]
    Gust Speed [id=GUST]
      Range 0 to 500 Unit km/h [uom id=32]
      Range 0 to 500 Unit mph [uom id=48]
    Distance [id=DISTANC]
    Climate Coverage [id=GV11]
    Climate Intensity [id=GV12]
    Climate Conditions [id=GV13]
    Cloud Conditions [id=GV14]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit Relative Humidity [uom id=22]
    Feels Like [id=GV2]
      Range -50 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Heat Index [id=HEATIX]
      Range -50 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Windchill [id=WINDCH]
      Range -50 to 100 Unit Celsius [uom id=4] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
      Range -50 to 150 Unit Fahrenheit [uom id=17] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Precipitation [id=PRECIP]
      Range 0 to 10000 Unit Millimeter [uom id=82]
      Range 0 to 20000 Unit Inches [uom id=105]
    Snow Depth [id=GV15]
      Range 0 to 10000 Unit Millimeter [uom id=82]
      Range 0 to 20000 Unit Inches [uom id=105]
    Solar Radiation [id=SOLRAD]
    UV Index [id=UV]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Re-Discover [id=DISCOVER]
    Remove Notices [id=REMOVE_NOTICES_ALL]

USER QUERY: Turn on the Foyer Lamp to 80% at sunset but only if precipitation is less than 1 mm.
